channel.title: Connecting wit Himachi
channel.description: Ok, so i entered the name and pass and im logged into the server. Now what do i put in the moparscape client to actually log in and play?any help appreciated

item.title: Connecting wit Himachi
item.dc:creator: @_ownage1 ~ownage~
item.description:
@_ownage1 wrote:

mitchtheblonde:

Ok, so i entered the name and pass and im logged into the server. Now what do i put in the moparscape client to actually log in and play?any help appreciated

'to log into a server using hamachi you must go in the channel then put in the server port of that server and also but the ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting wit Himachi
item.dc:creator: @shorty_5855 shorty_5855
item.description:
@shorty_5855 wrote:

to login to a server on moparscape after you joined the hamachi network you have to make sure you port forwarded the port that server uses then on the client you put new port and enter the port that server uses on the login page u enter any username and any pass then the server ip that server uses…you should be able to find all that info on the server’s advertisement thread…hope this helps

Read full topic
